para.text: The Retirement Board shall furnish to any participant or beneficiary who so requests in writing a statement indicating, on the basis of the latest available information:
The nonforfeitable retirement benefits, if any, that have accrued, or the earliest date on which benefits will become nonforfeitable.
A participant or beneficiary shall not be entitled to receive more than one report under subsection (a) of this section during any 12-month period.
